Wij snappen dat je het druk hebt en geen: We understand that you're busy and don't want to wait in long lines or for a long washing cycle. That's why every machine in our network is set up to wash your car as quickly as possible.

Je rijdt de wasstraat in en positioneert: Drive into the car wash and position your car as indicated. When your car is in the right position, the washing program starts automatically.

Hoe vaak mag ik met mijn auto komen wass: How often can I wash my car with a wash subscription?
Bij Basic Wash hanteren wij een ‘Fair Us: At Basic Wash we have a 'Fair Use Policy'. This means that with a subscription, you can wash your car up to 3 times more than the average number of washes in that month. This way we can offer everyone the opportunity to drive a clean car! As an indication: last month, the 'Fair Use Policy' limit was 10 washes per month.
Hoe gaat de betaling van mijn abonnement: How does the payment of my subscription work?
Een abonnement sluit je af met een IDEAL: You close a subscription with an IDEAL payment. At the same time, you authorize us to collect the subscription fee monthly. After your first IDEAL payment, you don't have to do anything else.
Wat gebeurt er als een betaling wordt ge: What happens if a payment is reversed?
Het systeem blokkeert dan automatisch jo: The system will automatically block your subscription, and you won't be able to close a new one.
Hoe vaak kan ik het beste mijn auto wass: How often should I wash my car?
De brancheorganisatie BOVAG adviseert de: The BOVAG branch organization advises consumers to wash their cars monthly. Our experts recommend visiting a Basic Wash location every two weeks. This way you prevent deeply ingrained dirt on the paint and keep the value of your car high!
Kan mijn auto zonder risico door de wass: Can my car go through the car wash without any risk?
Je vermijdt het grootste risico op laksc: You avoid the biggest risk of paint damage by washing your car with us. Rinsing off things like salt, sand, and bird droppings will keep your car in top condition. Additionally, we work together with you to ensure a trouble-free and risk-free car wash. How?
Jij helpt mee door zorgvuldig de instruc: You can help by carefully following the instructions and directions, removing the antenna from the roof beforehand, and turning off the engine during the wash.
Wij regelen de rest, door onder andere h: We'll take care of the rest by using high-quality detergents, foam and textile brushes to prevent scratches, and intensive maintenance to keep the washing system's quality high.
Kom dus met een gerust hart naar een van: So come to one of our Basic Wash locations with peace of mind for a risk-free car wash!

Na het inklappen van de spiegels en het: After folding the mirrors and removing the antenna, position your car in front of the entrance;

Welke betalingsmogelijkheden kent Basic: What payment options does Basic Wash offer?
De betaling van jouw abonnement verloopt: The payment of your subscription is done through a monthly or yearly automatic debit. You can easily pay for the other facilities at Basic Wash locations through contactless payment terminals.
Wat moet ik doen bij schade, verlies of: What should I do in case of damage, loss or theft?
Wij helpen je graag om een juiste afhand: We are happy to help you follow the correct procedure! Document the incident as accurately as possible based on the available facts. Inform us and we will do our best to come to a solution as quickly as possible together!
Wat kan ik met het Klantportaal van Basi: What can I do with Basic Wash's customer portal?

Hoe kan ik mijn gegevens wijzigen?: How can I change my data?
Het wijzigen van je persoonsgegevens kun: You can change your personal data yourself in the customer portal. For changing your license plate or bank account number, you can leave it to us.
Hoe kan ik bij mijn facturen?: How can I access my invoices?
Het inzien of ophalen van jouw facturen: Viewing or retrieving your invoices is quick and easy to arrange. Log in to your customer portal, find the right invoice, and download the PDF file.
Bij een mislukte betaling zullen wij jou: If a payment fails, we will inform you by email. This email will contain a payment request to settle the outstanding payment. After processing, you can reactivate your subscription. After that, you are welcome again at one of our Basic Wash locations!
Hoe vaak kan ik mijn kenteken laten wijz: How often can I change my license plate?
Het wijzigen van je kenteken is maximaal: You can change your license plate a maximum of 3 times within a period of one year.

Wat is de maximale bandenmaat bij mijn B: What is the maximum tire size at my Basic Wash location?

Past jouw auto in onze Carwash?: Will your car fit in our car wash?
Vul je kenteken in, wij controleren het: Enter your license plate, we'll check it for you!
Om u de optimale bruikbaarheid van onze: In order to provide you with the optimal functionality of our digital map, we need to know a few things. At Basic Wash, your privacy and online security are of the utmost importance. Therefore, we only ask for the most basic information about you. This includes your name, address, telephone number, date of birth, email address, and, if possible, your license plate number.
Waarom hebben we persoonsdata nodig?: Why do we need personal data?
Uw persoonlijke gegevens worden bij ons: Your personal data is securely stored with us to provide the most efficient recognition and accessibility when using your digital map. You can also choose, based solely on your previous purchases in our store, to receive automated targeted promotions and actions.
